3. City Council

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* First and Third Tuesdays of each month.
* 6:00 p.m.
* City Council Chambers  
  206 N. Murphy Road.  
  Murphy, TX 75094

View [meeting regulations](https://www.murphytx.org/193/Meeting-Regulations "meeting regulations") for the City Council.

Agendas
-------

Agendas are available prior to meetings.

[Most Recent Agenda](https://murphytx.civicweb.net/Portal/Welcome.aspx "Most Recent City Council Agenda") | [View Agendas Prior to 4/17](https://www.murphytx.org/Archive.aspx?AMID=39 "View All City Council Agendas")

Minutes
-------

Minutes are available upon approval.

[Most Recent Minutes](https://murphytx.civicweb.net/Portal/Welcome.aspx "Most Recent City Council Minutes") | [View Minute Prior to 4/17](https://www.murphytx.org/Archive.aspx?AMID=40 "View All City Council Minutes")

Video Recordings
----------------

Video recordings of the meetings are also available.

[View Live](https://www.murphytx.org/586/Council-Meeting-Video "Most Recent City Council Meeting Video Recording") | [View All Video Recordings](https://www.murphytx.org/586/Council-Meeting-Video "View All City Council Meeting Video Recordings")

![City Council 2025](https://www.murphytx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=9695)

[![Ask Council](https://www.murphytx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=3095)](https://www.murphytx.org/1967)

Members
-------

Individual City Council members may be contacted by following their name link below or the council may be emailed as a [group](https://www.murphytx.org/1967). All Council Members are elected at-large and represent all Murphy Citizens.  The Place numbers are important for identifying the Council members.

* [Scott Bradley](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=6), Mayor
* [Elizabeth Abraham](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=7), Mayor Pro Tem , Place 1
* [Scott Smith](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=8), Council Member, Place 2
* [Andrew Chase](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=10), Council Member, Place 3

* [Ken Oltmann](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=9), Council Member, Place 4
* [Laura Deel](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=11), Council Member, Place 5
* [Jené Butler](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=12), Deputy Mayor Pro Tem, Place 6
